CVLIFE Eaglefeather sniper reticle

Hi fellas!
This is my 9th usersight based on the CVLIFE Eaglefeather 1-6X24 LPVO rifle scope. The design was pretty interesting and it caught my eye as I was searching for more usersights to make.

I've made the shapes around the reticle to be outlined instead of filled to translate it into a WT sight that's usable for low tier and high tier engagements by including 2 variants of the sight with or without ballistic range lines.

I also arranged the ballistic indicators to integrate well enough that the numbers will align...
my sight im actually posting here ive made more but most are to spicy for this site if you want them contact me on discord @1958_plymouth_fury1 character and art by fluff kevlar #furry

B-17

hey guys I'm back, sorry I've been gone for a little

B-17 sight by Zetta

if it doesn't work, then:

1: find war thunder in your steam library
2: right-click the war thunder game tab and go to "manage --> browse local files"
3: navigate to your "UserSights" folder
4: create a new folder (unless you already have one) and rename it to include the country of origin and the name of the tank (ex. ussr_t_72m2_moderna | germ_marder_1a1), then open that folder, and drop the sight in.
*5: if your war thunder client is already running, press Alt+F9 to reload the sight cache. if it doe...

More than meets the eye.

Hello fellas!
My 8th WT usersight is finally finished!
The usersight is a rendition of the Trijicon ACOG scope reticle that's done in 4 styles that suits best in War Thunder's frantic environment of ground battles.
Style 1 features a triangular range line, style 2 has a more circular reticle with dots in the middle, and style 3 is basically a more complex version of style 2 with more center range lines.
There's also an alternate version of style 2 where the ballistic indicators are to the left, in case if you d...

Всем привет!

Решил выложить прицел сюда по мотивам: https://forum.warthunder.ru/t/izmenenie-standartnoj-priczelnoj-setki/90336

Прицел сделан на основе: https://live.warthunder.com/post/1052013/en/
Создан исключительно для ТРБ (Танковые реалистичные бои). Изначально цель была удалить вертикальные риски с горизонтальной линии прицеливания. В итоге получилось это сделать через отрисовку с нуля линий прицеливания и указателя прицеливания.


Установка стандартная:
- Распаковать архив в папку WarThunder/UserSight/all_tanks (либо в папку с конкретным танком)
